componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The Manage Products component is only available for Cases and Work Orders in an open status.

To review Associated Products navigate to the Associated Products Quick Links or the Related tab.

To update Associated Products reopen the Case and/or Work Order.

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: (1 AND ( NOT (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) ) AND ( (6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10) ) )

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Case Owner no longer has access to the page
